title: Lorraine Wild
content: You have to be interested in culture to design for it.

title: David Starr
content: Wisdom is knowing what to do next, skill is knowing how to do it, and virtue is doing it.

title: Aristotle
content: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, therefore, is not an act, but a habit.

title: Ingmar Bergman
content: I make all my decisions on intuition. But then, I must know why I made that decision. I throw a spear into the darkness. That is intuition. Then I must send an army into the darkness to find the spear. That is intellect.

title: Dylan Thomas
content: You can tear a poem apart to see what makes it tick… You’re back with the mystery of having been moved by words. The best craftsmanship always leaves holes and gaps… so that something that is not in the poem can creep, crawl, flash or thunder in.
